favourite.article: I was first introduced to this hymn during the winter training 2005. I have been singing it ever since, often times before meetings. Praise the Lord for this wonderful prayer/song. It addresses many of the reasons our spirit doesn't flow. Singing it gives the Lord room to clear out the all blockages and to allow our spirit to freely flow. Try it!

In this message I would also like to recommend Hymns, #846. It will help us to read, pray, and sing this hymn...
Source: Fellowship concerning the Urgent Need of the Vital Groups, chapter 12.
